评论详情: These pants are not at all what I expected to receive when I placed my order. For one thing, they're advertised as soft, and they are - on the outside. The inside is a shiny, sateen-like material, not soft at all. I probably would have kept them regardless of that, except that someone made the baffling decision to make these pants with extra seams. Each leg has three seams, the usual on each side and then one going down the back. Who wants to sit on pant leg seams? It's nonsensical and not comfortable, so I'm returning these.

I’m tempted to buy another and trying out the XS to see if I like a slightly more fitted look. If I get it in black will it pass off as work appropriate pants? I have not actually worn it yet, so cannot attest to quality. But first impressions are good so far.
